extraData: TARGET minecraft:pillager ACTION kill TIMES 5 USING empty
name: Bad guys
text: Maybe you are not so useless after all!/nThe Summer Court is constantly under attack by a group of raiders,/nwho hunt down our kind to grind them into dust!/nWe, and by we I mean you, should g&take g&down those r&pillagers!/nThen with you as my champion we can share our victory with the Queen,/nand I will be forever in her favour!! -evil giggle- /nPerfect! So...why are you still standing here? Go! Now!
